nodes.text: The turlossus were a colossal species of reptiles home to Dhandu 3. Non-aggressive herbivores, the turlossus walked on the grasslands of Dhandu 3 in herds. To prevent their cities from being crushed by the turlossus, the Dhanduese inhabitants instead built on top of the creatures' flat shells, with catwalks and bridges to connect the various districts together when they were nearby.
